Name: Stay in
About the game: Game Overview This is a casual action horror FPS game. This game includes some 'JumpScare's. The objective is to find a certain suitcase in a hotel, hiding from terrifying creatures and sometimes fighting back. A variety of actions can be performed on objects. Attraction Free exploration and a variety of actions are the main attractions. Use your imagination and wide variety of items. This game has multiple endings (two types). About Streaming No license is required. Please feel free to distribute this game and promote it.
